import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { LoginContext } from "../LoginWindow/LoginContext"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import searchImage from "../assets/images/search.png"; function MainWindow() { const [context, setContext] = useContext(LoginContext); const navigate = useNavigate(); function handleLogout() { setContext(""); navigate("/"); } return ( <> {/* border border-primary */}
Olim Tech
{context}
); } export default MainWindow;
